## Reference File

**watch-tab-v9.jsx** â€” The V9 prototype (712 lines). This file lives in the same folder as this tracker. All line numbers reference this file directly.

---

## Overview

Visual prototype of the Relevant Radio mobile app **Watch Tab**, built one component at a time in Claude Code (React with inline styles). Each task is a discrete, small-scope component that can be built in isolation and assembled into the full Watch Tab.

### V9 Design System â€” Two Card Types + Universal Badges

V9 consolidated 6 different card formats from V8 down to **two universal card types** and **one badge system** used everywhere:

| Card Type | Width | Used In | Shows |
|-----------|-------|---------|-------|
| **Episode Card** | 155px | Continue Watching, New This Week, all episode rows, Documentaries | Thumbnail (88px) + badge + progress bar + series label (gray caps) + title (1 line truncated bold) + duration (gray text) |
| **Series Card** | 220px | Featured Series, Fr. Rocky Teaching | Thumbnail (100px) + badge + title (bold) + subtitle ("N episodes") |

**Universal Badge System:**
- Position: top-right of thumbnail, always
- Shape: pill (borderRadius 20)
- Priority: LIVE > UP NEXT > NEW (one badge per card)
- Colors: LIVE = solid red + white text, UP NEXT = solid green + white text, NEW = solid dark green + white text
- CONTINUE badge: only on hero carousel, dark semi-transparent + white text

### Three Pages

1. **Watch Home** â€” hero carousel, 3-state prayer strip, continue watching, new this week, featured series, episode rows, teaching rows, documentaries
2. **All Series** â€” full catalog browse with search + 7 category filters (incl. Documentaries)
3. **Series Detail** â€” hero banner, subscribe, continue watching, episode list

Plus a **Video Player** (4 states) that lives on top of all pages (separate build).

---

## Design Foundation

### Three Personas (from n=11,361 survey)

| Persona | Age | % of Base | Front Door | Key Need |
|---------|-----|-----------|------------|----------|
| **Margaret** (Daily Faithful) | 65â€“74+ | ~50% | Live prayer / 3-state strip | Zero friction. One tap. Large targets. Clear state changes. |
| **Michael** (Committed Catholic) | 45â€“64 | ~35% | Continue Watching / named series | Resume playback. Speed control. Binge. New This Week. |
| **Katie** (Seeking Catholic) | 25â€“44 | ~15% | Featured content / Family Rosary | On-ramp. Video. Kids. Share. |

### Four-Zone Architecture

| Zone | Section | Persona Served |
|------|---------|---------------|
| **Zone 1** â€” Daily Prayer | 3-state prayer strip + hero (live state) | Margaret + committed Katie |
| **Zone 2** â€” Featured | Hero carousel (editorial) + Featured Series row | Returning Katie + Michael discovery |
| **Zone 3** â€” Continue Watching | Continue Watching row + New This Week | Michael (his #1 need) |
| **Zone 4** â€” Series Depth | Episode rows, Fr. Rocky Teaching, All Series, Series Detail | Michael + Katie depth |

### Design Tokens (Lines 44â€“56)

```
bg: "#FFFFFF"          surface: "#F5F5F7"       card: "#FFFFFF"
border: "rgba(0,0,0,0.08)"
gold: "#B8922E"        goldSoft: "rgba(184,146,46,0.08)"   goldText: "#8A6D1B"
prayerAccent: "#2E7D4C"
live: "#D43333"        liveSoft: "rgba(212,51,51,0.05)"    liveBg: "#FEF2F2"
text1: "#1A1A1A"       text2: "#6B6B6B"         text3: "#9A9A9A"       text4: "#C8C8C8"
newBadge: "#1A6B3A"    newBadgeSoft: "rgba(26,107,58,0.08)"
```

### Pain Points Addressed Per Component

Each task below notes which of the 7 pain points it addresses:
- **PP#1** "I don't know you have video" â€” surface video immediately
- **PP#2** "The prayer I want is audio-only" â€” video prayer integration
- **PP#3** "I can't share what moved me" â€” share buttons, shareable clips
- **PP#4** "I can't find what I'm looking for" â€” search, curation, progress tracking
- **PP#5** "I can't see the people I listen to" â€” host faces, show clips
- **PP#6** "My phone is too small / can't figure this out" â€” large targets, simplicity
- **PP#7** "There's nothing for my kids" â€” family prayer, kid-friendly content

---

## V9 Reusable Primitives (Lines 163â€“255)

Unlike V7/V8, V9 has **explicit shared components** that are used across the entire prototype. These ARE built as reusable components:

| Component | Lines | What It Does |
|-----------|-------|-------------|
| **Badge** | 177â€“185 | Pill badge top-right of any thumbnail. 3 types: live, upnext, new. |
| **DurationStamp** | 189â€“195 | DEPRECATED on cards â€” still used in Series Detail episode list thumbnails. |
| **ProgressBar** | 199â€“205 | Gold bar at bottom edge of thumbnail. |
| **EpisodeCard** | 210â€“228 | 155px episode card â€” thumbnail + badge + progress bar + 3 text lines. |
| **SeriesCard** | 230â€“241 | 220px series card â€” thumbnail + badge + title + subtitle. |
| **SectionHeader** | 247â€“252 | Bold section title with optional right-aligned link. |
| **ScrollRow** | 254â€“256 | Horizontal scroll container. |

### TASK 1 â€” App Shell + Tab Bar + Phone Frame
**Status:** âœ… Complete (pre-existing in index.html â€” phone frame, status bar, bottom nav, Now Playing bar all already built)
**Priority:** 1st (everything sits inside this)
**Pain Points:** PP#6 (clear navigation, large tap targets)
**Persona:** All three

**What it is:**
The outer phone frame, status bar, and bottom tab bar that wraps all Watch Tab content.

**Requirements:**
- Phone frame: borderRadius 44, 1px border, boxShadow, max-width 420px
- Status bar: time on left (simulated from TimeSimulator), battery icon on right
- Tab bar at bottom: 5 tabs â€” Listen (â™«), Watch (â–¶ active), Pray (âœ), Books (ğŸ“–), More (â€¢â€¢â€¢)
- Active tab: goldText color, bold weight, gold dot indicator below
- Inactive tabs: opacity 0.4
- Home indicator bar at very bottom (130px wide, 4px tall, centered)
- Background: white (#FFFFFF)

**Reference:** Lines 152â€“161 (TabBar), Lines 660â€“712 (main app shell + page router)

### TASK 2 â€” Watch Home Header

**Priority:** 2nd
**Pain Points:** PP#4 (navigation to search and catalog)
**Persona:** All three

The top bar of the Watch Home page with the "Watch" title, "All Series" link, and search icon.

**Requirements:**

- Right side, two items:
  - "All Series" text link: 13px, fontWeight 600, goldText color, tappable â†’ All Series page
  - Search icon button: 34x34px square, borderRadius 10, surface background, border, centered SearchGlass icon (16px)
- Padding: 14px 18px 12px

**Reference:** Lines 380â€“386 of watch-tab-v9.jsx

---

### TASK 3 â€” Hero Billboard / Carousel
**Status:** âœ… Complete
**Priority:** 3rd (first thing user sees below header)
**Pain Points:** PP#1 (surface video), PP#2 (live prayer visible), PP#4 (resume)
**Persona:** All three â€” the single most important real estate on the Watch Tab

**What it is:**
A large featured card with TWO modes:
1. **Live mode** â€” when a prayer is streaming, hero becomes a red-tinted live card with LIVE badge top-right (pill-shaped)
2. **Carousel mode** â€” when nothing live, shows 4 swipeable editorial slides

**V9 Design Decisions (different from V7):**
- **No slide counter** (1/3 removed â€” unnecessary chrome)
- **No "Featured" badge** â€” being in the hero IS the feature
- **CONTINUE pill** on resume slides: top-right of thumbnail, dark semi-transparent (rgba(0,0,0,0.55)), white text, pill-shaped. Only appears on slides with isContinue: true.
- **LIVE badge on hero: top-right** (same position as all other badges â€” consistent placement)
- **No percentage text** (e.g., "65% watched") â€” progress bar alone communicates position
- **First slide is Lenten Lessons on the Mass** (timely editorial choice for Lent 2026)

**Requirements â€” Live Mode:**
- Full-width card, borderRadius 16, liveBg background, red-tinted border
- Image area: 170px tall, gradient background, centered 56px round PLAY button (red bg, white icon)
- LIVE pill badge: top-right, red bg, pulsing white dot + "LIVE" text, borderRadius 20
- Below image: prayer name in Georgia serif (20px, 800 weight) + detail text in red
- Tappable â†’ navigates to series detail

**Requirements â€” Carousel Mode (4 slides):**
- Same card structure (170px image area + text below)
- Slide data (Lines 262â€“267):
  - **Slide 1:** "Lenten Lessons on the Mass" â€” Fr. Rocky Â· 40 episodes (no continue pill)
  - **Slide 2:** "SEEK 2026" â€” 24 talks Â· Watch the full series (no continue pill)
  - **Slide 3:** "Life Is Worth Living" â€” Fulton Sheen Â· Ep. 4 of 12 (CONTINUE pill + 65% progress bar)
  - **Slide 4:** "Into the Breach" â€” Knights of Columbus Â· Ep. 2 of 8 (CONTINUE pill + 38% progress bar)
- Continue slides: darker play button, gold progress bar, CONTINUE pill top-right
- Non-continue slides: ghost play button, no pill, no progress bar
- Pagination dots below card: active = gold 18px wide, inactive = text4 6px circle
- Tappable dots + tappable card

**Reference:** Lines 262â€“313 of watch-tab-v9.jsx

---

### TASK 4 â€” Live Daily Prayer Cards (3-State Strip)
**Status:** âœ… Complete
**Priority:** 4th
**Pain Points:** PP#2 (video prayer integration), PP#6 (one-tap access, clear state feedback)
**Persona:** Margaret (primary), Katie (family prayer)

**What it is:**
Three side-by-side prayer cards ordered chronologically through the day: Mass (12 PM), Chaplet (3 PM), Rosary (7 PM). Each card has a gradient thumbnail, prayer name + time, and a **3-state strip** below that handles all reminder/live interaction.

**V9 Design Decisions (different from V7/V8):**
- **No bell icon on thumbnail** â€” the strip owns ALL reminder state
- **3-state strip** replaces the old bell toggle + "Remind me" disappearing strip
- **Three distinct colors** for Margaret's visibility:
  - State 1 "Remind me" â€” gold background, dashed top border, outline bell icon, gold text
  - State 2 "Reminder set" â€” **light green** background, solid border, filled bell icon, green text
  - State 3 "Watch now" â€” **solid red** background, pulsing white dot, white text
- **Order is chronological:** Mass â†’ Chaplet â†’ Rosary (left to right follows the day)
- Tapping the strip toggles between State 1 â†” State 2
- State 3 activates automatically when that prayer is LIVE (driven by time simulator)

**Requirements:**
- Section header: "Live Daily Prayer" (14px, 800 weight) + subtitle "Pray live with your Catholic family" (11px, text3)
- 3 cards in a row, each flex: 1 (equal width), 8px gap
- Each card structure:
  - **Photo area:** 72px tall, gradient background, host initials centered as faint serif text
  - **No badge or bell on thumbnail** â€” clean gradient only
  - **Info area:** prayer short name in Georgia serif (12px, 700) left, time or "â— Now" right
  - Card always has top-rounded corners (12px 12px 0 0) â€” strip is always visible below
- **Strip below card** (always present, one of 3 states):
  - Rounded bottom corners (0 0 12px 12px) to complete the card shape
  - Bell icon (10px) + label text (8px, 700 weight)
  - Tappable â€” toggles reminder state

**State logic:**
- Uses simulated time (or real time) to determine live/upcoming/past
- Mass: 12:00â€“12:45 PM
- Chaplet: 3:00â€“3:20 PM
- Rosary: 7:00â€“7:25 PM
- stripState = isLive ? "live" : reminderSet ? "set" : "unset"

**Data (Lines 89â€“93):**
```
Mass:    { time: "12:00 PM", gradient: "#7A6B52 â†’ #3D3528", initials: "FR" }
Chaplet: { time: "3:00 PM",  gradient: "#4F6275 â†’ #253A4D", initials: "DM" }
Rosary:  { time: "7:00 PM",  gradient: "#5B6B4F â†’ #2A3B22", initials: "FR" }
```

**Reference:** Lines 316â€“370 of watch-tab-v9.jsx

### TASK 5 â€” Continue Watching Row (Episode Cards)
**Status:** âœ… Complete
**Priority:** 5th
**Pain Points:** PP#4 ("I can never find where I was" â€” Michael's #1 complaint)
**Persona:** Michael (primary)

**What it is:**
Horizontal scroll row of in-progress episodes using the universal **EpisodeCard** component.

**V9 Design Decisions:**
- Uses EpisodeCard (155px) â€” same card as everywhere else
- Series name is the gray uppercase label (e.g., "KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS"), title is the episode name (e.g., "Into the Breach") â€” NOT the other way around
- Duration as 3rd text line (9px, text4) â€” not on thumbnail overlay
- Progress bar on thumbnail (bottom edge, gold)
- UP NEXT badge (pill, solid green, white text) on unwatched next episode

**Requirements:**
- Section header: "Continue Watching" via SectionHeader component
- Horizontal scroll via ScrollRow component, 10px gap
- 3 Episode Cards:
  1. FULTON SHEEN / "Life Is Worth Living" / 27:14 / progress 0.38
  2. KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS / "Into the Breach" / 32:15 / progress 0.72
  3. 5-MIN HOMILIES / "Sunday Feb 23" / 5:12 / badge "upnext"
- Tappable â†’ navigates to series detail

**Reference:** Lines 393â€“401 of watch-tab-v9.jsx

### TASK 19 â€” Episode List

## Full Section Order â€” Watch Home (Top to Bottom)

1. **Watch Home Header** (Task 2)
2. **Hero Billboard / Carousel** (Task 3) â€” live mode OR 4-slide carousel
3. *12px spacer*
4. **Live Daily Prayer Cards** (Task 4) â€” 3 prayer cards + 3-state strips
5. *divider*
6. **Continue Watching** (Task 5) â€” Episode Cards with progress bars
7. *divider*
8. **New This Week** (Task 6) â€” Episode Cards with NEW badges
9. *divider*
10. **Featured Series** (Task 7) â€” Series Cards + "All Series" link
11. *divider*
12. **Fulton Sheen row** (Task 8) â€” Episode Cards
13. *16px spacer*
14. **Fr. Rocky Teaching** (Task 9) â€” Series Cards
15. *16px spacer*
16. **The Vatican Today row** (Task 8) â€” Episode Cards

---

## V9 Key Design Decisions Log

| Decision | Rationale |
|----------|-----------|
| 6 card formats â†’ 2 (EpisodeCard + SeriesCard) | Consistency. One mental model for users. Easier to build. |
| Duration moved from thumbnail overlay to 3rd text line | Cleaner thumbnails. Duration is metadata, not visual content. |
| No duration on Series Cards | Series are collections â€” no single duration to show. Episode count communicates scope. |
| Pill-shaped badges (borderRadius 20) | More modern, more visible, consistent shape language everywhere. |
| High-contrast badges (solid bg, white text) | Margaret's eyesight. Must be readable at arm's length. |
| 3-state prayer strip (gold â†’ green â†’ red) | Clear feedback for Margaret. Each state is unmistakable. Bell icon removed from thumbnail. |
| Prayer order: Mass â†’ Chaplet â†’ Rosary | Chronological through the day. Natural reading order. |
| CONTINUE pill on hero (not "Featured" badge) | Being in the hero IS featured. Only resume slides need a label. |
| No slide counter on hero | Unnecessary chrome. Pagination dots are sufficient. |
| No percentage text on hero | Progress bar alone communicates position. Cleaner. |
| No dates on New This Week cards | Same card as everything else. NEW badge + section context is enough. |
| Series Card subtitles: just "N episodes" | Unified language. No genre descriptors. Clean. |
| Fr. Rocky Teaching: Series Cards in scroll (not grid) | Same card type as Featured Series. Consistency over novelty. |
| Documentaries: Episode Cards (not special wider cards) | Runtime format "1h 38m" communicates film length. No special card needed. |
| First hero slide: Lenten Lessons on the Mass | Timely editorial choice for Lent 2026 season. |

---
